text: Global Communicorp UK owns UK radio brands including Capital networks in Scotland and South Wales, Heart Networks in Yorkshire and North Wales, Smooth Radio networks in the North East, North West and East Midlands as well as XS Manchester. Another seven regional Capital, Heart and Smooth stations are part of the brandsâ€™ UK wide network. Also owned is one local station - XS Manchester. title: Global Communicorp UK
